      • viewUser

        public static java.lang.String[] viewUser(java.lang.String userID,
                          Database database)
        View user.
        Returns information on user in database in a String array

        Columns by index:
        0 : user_id - String
        1 : user_type - int
        2 : name - String
        Parameters:
        userID - User ID
        database - Database connection
        Returns:
        String[] of user info

      • viewAllUsers

        public static java.lang.String[][] viewAllUsers(Database database)
        View all users.
        Returns a list of all users in database in a two-dimensional String array

        Columns by second index:
        0 : user_id - String
        1 : user_type - int
        2 : name - String
        Parameters:
        database - Database connection
        Returns:
        String[][] with user info
